overview: Music legend Otis Redding's career was just starting to fly when he was tragically killed in a plane crash. This loving tribute introduced by Tommy Smothers is all about the music and contains thrilling concert footage from the Monterey Pop Festival and the Stax/Volt European Tour, featuring Redding backed by Booker T. and the MGs. Songs include "Try a Little Tenderness," "I've Been Loving You," "My Girl" and "Hold On."
title: Otis Redding: Remembering Otis
